channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to survive Paris during the 2024 Olympics
item.description: For the uninitiated, Paris can be a lot. So, Fortune spoke to tourism, insurance, banking, and culture experts for their tips on navigating the city.

item.title: Khamenei protégé, sole moderate neck and neck in Iran presidential race
item.description: A low-key moderate and a protégé of Iran's supreme leader are neck-and-neck in the vote count in snap presidential elections marked by voter apathy.

item.title: Bond market braces for bigger deficits under either Trump or Biden
5 ways to keep work stress from straining your relationship
item.description: Multiple studies show that work stress strains relationships, and even leads to many ending.

item.title: Amazon is doubling value of credits for startups to build on AWS as Microsoft cloud gains ground
item.description: With Microsoft's artificial intelligence technology drawing in more entrepreneurs to its cloud, Amazon wants to ensure that founders keep building on AWS.

item.title: Here’s what Trump and Biden got wrong about Social Security in their debate
Top Democrats close ranks around Joe Biden after disastrous debate as potential replacements Whitmer and Newsom back the president
item.description: Donors and party operatives shared panicked text messages and phone calls Thursday night and into Friday expressing their concern that Biden’s performance was so bad that he may be unelectable this fall.

item.title: Amazon beefs up AI development, hiring execs from startup Adept and licensing its technology
item.description: As part of the deal, Amazon will license technology from Adept including some of its AI models and datasets.

item.title: Trump and Biden dodged a question on child-care costs. Parents aren't pleased.
A year after a record-breaking summer for travel, Americans are still dead set on getting away. Some are putting off major life milestones to afford it
item.description: One in five millennials said they are postponing major purchases like buying a home to pay for travel.

item.title: JPMorgan and Morgan Stanley boost buybacks and dividends, while Citigroup and BofA take smaller steps
item.description: The big banks announced their plans to boost capital return to shareholders after passing the annual stress test administered by the Federal Reserve this week.

item.title: Biden and Trump largely skipped over record-high housing costs at debate
Trump blames immigrants for taking ‘Black jobs.’ Top economists debunk long-held arguments like it
item.description: The long-standing question is "settled," Harvard economist Lant Pritchett says.

item.title: Ford CEO says a profitable $30,000 EV is coming in two and a half years
item.description: Farley said its main competitors are expected to be Chinese automakers such as BYD and an anticipated entry-level car from U.S. EV leader Tesla.

item.title: S&P 500 clinches double-digit gain in first half of 2024 as stock rally persists
